page.title: 03Police and Community Centre.
page.content: Canvey Police Station has been in full operation for roughly 62 years. They usually gets 50 calls a week,depending on the time of year.They patrol Canvey Island but occassionally they help other forces with big events eg motor racing and Carnivals. Situated in Long Road in the centre of Canvey Island is The Paddocks. It has large grounds and was opened in 1973.It has a public bar,foyers,three halls,cloakrooms and dressing rooms on the ground floor, plus three committee room upstairs.The main hall seats 400, holds 600 for dancing and has a large stage and its own bar lounge. Another hall holds 300 people, has a small stage and its own bar lounge. A third hall suitable for smaller occasions, holds 100 people. There is ample car parking.
